cab.content: ^^^aF^Hmel F.tt, Marsk - Caucasus Military Agent 293To Director of Military Intelligence.Tiflis 7th August^ 191?,T.L. ESQ.On August 8til the mm of the 21st Caucasus Hlfles Regiment and 6th Caucasus Rifles Division thrashed their Colonel and 7 other officers. Investigation Is being made into the matter but tho facts are prima facie evidence of bad frame of mind among troops. Initial cause was order to go to the front. The regiment is being disbanded and the offenders are to be dealt with by the newly re-introduced death penalty.to
